snippet: A new center at the University of Pennsylvania will be dedicated to studying BRCA, a set of genes with ties to breast and ovarian cancer.
abstract: Basser Research Center at the University of Pennsylvania will be the first comprehensive facility to focus on specific genetic mutations that cause cancer; center was founded by Blackstone executive Jon Gray and his wife Mindy, who lost her sister to ovarian cancer from an inherited mutation in a gene called BRCA.
lead_paragraph: A new center at the University of Pennsylvania will be dedicated to studying BRCA, a set of genes with ties to breast and ovarian cancer.

headline.seo: Basser Research Center to Focus on BRCA Cancer Genes
headline.main: Research Center to Focus on Cancer Genes
headline.print_headline: Research Center to Focus on Cancer Genes
